title: Random Freezing in Game
body:
So I did a clean install onto a new laptop and now it is randomly freezing in game (generally when going into a fight, not very helpful)

I've had a look around and a few others are reporting the problem but no one seems to have a solution.  I have checked the logs and I have included this mornings game log.

http://pastebin.com/RAi8PQY5

I am guessing this it the start of the problem:

000004.813|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "D:/Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.114/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000004.813|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :D:/Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.114/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml
000004.813|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "\Bin\Data\D:/Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.114/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml" because it's not in the manifest.
000004.813|       0.0000kb|      0.0000kb added|  ERROR| Missing file on r3dGFile open :\Bin\Data\D:/Games/League of Legends/RADS/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/0.0.1.114/deploy/Data/Menu/IMEConfig.xml

replies.body: Although your game may not be completely crashing, I still recommend you try the solutions in the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article. Please let me know if anything works, as if nothing works, we can troubleshoot using other methods.
